snippet.title: The Silent Kingdom - demo trailer (indie otome RPG)
snippet.description:
The Silent Kingdom is a story-driven, otome RPG where the player's choices and interactions with other characters set the narrative. It tells the dark tale of a princess who must corrupt her own soul in order to save her kingdom, reaping death and sorrow along the path.

A free demo containing the prologue has been released on Steam and itch.io.

===
Twitter: https://twitter.com/LuckyCatOtome
Steam: https://store.steampowered.com/app/1828650/The_Silent_Kingdom/
Itch.io: https://luckycatotome.itch.io/thesilentkingdom-demo

If you enjoy the demo, please consider supporting the Kickstarter campaign! https://www.kickstarter.com/projects/1039568441/the-silent-kingdom-dark-otome-rpg

==

Song: Luna
Composed by Koichi Morita. Vocals by Akane
https://www.youtube.com/channel/UCvNnyy0_KxpJegpv3ytVM5Q
